name: Fire Shield
effect:
:ongoing: When the targeted [unit](../units/index.md) is attacked by an adjacent [unit](../units/index.md) during this Combat round, the attacking [unit](../units/index.md) takes:

:empower: 0 ➣ 1 :damage:
:empower: 2 ➣ 2 :damage:
:empower: 4 ➣ 3 :damage:

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
notes: The attacking unit is damaged by the Fire Shield even if it defeats the unit which has Fire Shield.
